aboutFactory.title: About the Factory
paragraphs: Dnipro Metallurgical Rolling Mill is a leading manufacturer of cast rolling rolls.
We are located in the central part of Ukraine, in a major industrial and scientific center ‚Äî the city of Dnipro.
Our company is renowned for its long history and strong traditions dating back to 1896.
We produce cast rolls for modern plate, section, and pipe rolling mills, as well as non-metallurgical rolls and rollers.

list.title: Maximum barrel diameter of the roll
Maximum hardness of the working layer

metaData.title: Metal Casting for Any Need ‚Äì Reliability, Precision, and Quality!
metaData.description: We specialize in full-cycle metal casting, creating complex parts for various industries. To get in touch, call us at ‚òéÔ∏è +380567214558 or email üìß: AK.Koshubskiy@gmail.com. We look forward to working with you!

lyttyaMetaluPage.heading: Casting
lyttyaMetaluPage.title: Metal Casting for All Needs ‚Äî Reliability, Precision, and Quality!
lyttyaMetaluPage.description: Looking for professionals to produce high-quality metal products? We specialize in metal casting of any complexity for various industries, from mechanical engineering to construction. With modern equipment and advanced technologies, we ensure the production of parts that meet the highest standards of quality and precision.

infoCard.title: Quality and Durability of Metal Products
infoCard.description: We provide a full range of services in the field of metal casting, creating complex components for various industries. Thanks to modern technologies, our products are characterized by high precision, reliability, and long service life.

list.description: Casting using HTS technologies and low-pressure casting of non-ferrous metals

infoCard.title: End-to-End Production Process
infoCard.description: We ensure a full production cycle: from creating a technical project to delivering the finished product. This guarantees high quality and compliance with all client requirements.

infoCard.title: Variety of Materials
infoCard.description: We work with a wide range of metals, including alloyed steels and non-ferrous metal alloys, to achieve the best results for your project.

contacts.title: Contacts

listContacts.title: Address
listContacts.description: Yakhnenskivska Street, 2, Dnipro, Dnipropetrovsk Region, 49025, Ukraine

contacts.descriptionContact: For any inquiries, please contact us using the details provided above. We are available from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday to Friday. Email inquiries are processed within 24 hours.

metaData.title: ¬´Heat Treatment of Metals ‚Äî Strength, Reliability, and Precision!¬ª
metaData.description: We provide heat treatment services for metals, ensuring high-quality results for any industrial needs. Contact us at ‚òéÔ∏è +380567214558 or email us at üìß: AK.Koshubskiy@gmail.com. Your reliable partner in metalworking!

termoobrobkaPage.heading: Metal Heat Treatment
termoobrobkaPage.title: HEAT TREATMENT
termoobrobkaPage.description: We specialize in professional heat treatment of metals, which helps to enhance the properties of your products. Using modern technologies and an individual approach, we transform metal into a material that withstands the highest loads.

infoCard.title: Our Technological Capabilities
infoCard.description: We utilize a variety of modern equipment to achieve the best results:

infoCard.title: Innovative Approaches to Processing
infoCard.description: We use cutting-edge technologies to produce components that meet the highest quality standards and the most demanding industrial requirements.

infoCard.title: Optimization of Heat Treatment Processes
infoCard.description: We continuously improve our heat treatment methods to achieve maximum efficiency and cost reduction. Through optimized processes, we ensure consistent quality and shorter order fulfillment times.

infoCard.title: Durability and Longevity of Products
infoCard.description: We offer professional heat treatment of metals to achieve optimal mechanical properties for your components. With modern technologies, we guarantee high quality and reliability of treated products.

metaData.title: Metal Machining ‚Äì High Quality and Precision!
metaData.description: We provide metal machining services: turning, milling, grinding, and other types of processing. Guaranteed precision and quality! To get in touch, call us at ‚òéÔ∏è +380567214558 or email üìß: AK.Koshubskiy@gmail.com. We look forward to working with you!

mehobrobka.heading: Mechanical Processing
mehobrobka.title: Metal Processing ‚Äì High Quality and Precision!
mehobrobka.description: We turn your most complex tasks into efficient and precise solutions! With the most advanced equipment and cutting-edge mechanical processing technologies, we produce products of the highest quality, ensuring impeccable precision and reliability at every stage of production.

infoCard.title: Powerful fleet of modern equipment. We provide a full range of mechanical processing services:
High precision and reliability.
infoCard.description: We use only the best equipment and technologies to achieve maximum precision at all stages of processing. This allows us to manufacture parts that meet the highest requirements for reliability and durability.

infoCard.title: Comprehensive approach.
infoCard.description: We offer a full cycle of mechanical processing services ‚Äì from preliminary design to the manufacture of finished products. This saves you time searching for other contractors and ensures products that perfectly meet your requirements.

infoCard.title: Tailored solutions for every project.
infoCard.description: We consider all the specifics of your order and provide an individual approach to each project. From specification development to manufacturing and continuous quality control, we deliver the best results that meet all your requirements.

metaData.title: Cast Iron Rolls Casting ‚Äì Quality and Reliability for Your Production
metaData.description: We offer high-quality cast iron rolls casting services. Reliability, durability, and a personalized approach to every client. Contact us! To get in touch, call us at ‚òéÔ∏è +380567214558 or email üìß: AK.Koshubskiy@gmail.com. We look forward to working with you!
